info.title: Wolf Notification API
info.description: Wolf API for Managing Notification Templates and Messages and for Message-delivery

post.summary: Returns the compiled body and subject of the message.
Returns the compiled body and subject of the message for a given Template Name.
Compiles subject and body of message.await Saves to database. Posts event to queue
Compiles subject and body of message.await Saves to database. Posts event to queue
Returns list of messages by criteria

delete.summary: Delete message and all unreferenced depenent objects by ID

put.summary: Sets the DateSent on a message

tokenValues.description: Optional dictionary of values to replace in the template

providerCode.description: Optional notification provider code. If not specified the one in template is used. If the field is not specified in the template an error is thrown.

sender.description: Optional Sender name/address. If not specified the one in template is used. If the field is not specified in the template an error is thrown.

recipients.description: Optional list of Recipients. If not specified the one in template is used. If the field is not specified in the template an error is thrown.
